articles.author: Ana Sandoiu
articles.title: Coronavirus: 81% of cases are 'mild,' study says - Medical News Today
articles.description: Coronavirus: 81% of cases are 'mild,' study says Medical News Today Chinese CDC study finds Covid-19 virus to be more contagious than SARS or MERS CNN Study identifies new CoV responsible for the Wuhan outbreak News-Medical.net Fist Bumps vs. Handshakes: How …
articles.content:
A new paper by the Chinese Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CCDC) finds that the majority of coronavirus cases are mild, with older adults and people who have other conditions being most at risk.
